name: TalkAerial
commands: I wanted to keep an eye on his Majesty.|Why not do both?
C'mon, he's fine!|Sal's with him anyway.
Well, if anyone needs to lift him, I've got muscle to spare.
Look, there was something I wanted to ask.
Your revealed physique is taking all the attention from me!
That ain't much of a question...|But, I can teach you my regimen, if you'd like.
Too much work, I think putting on a bigger shirt is easier.
I'm sure you're plenty eye-catching enough, boss.
Now, I better keep at my training, peace.
source:
multi_add_portrait;Aerial;Right;Sages;Left
speak;Sages;Aerial, what are you doing?
speak;Aerial;Hey, Sagemeister!|I'm just running.
speak;Sages;Indoors?
speak;Aerial;I wanted to keep an eye on his Majesty.|Why not do both?
speak;Sages;C'mon, he's fine!|Sal's with him anyway.
speak;Aerial;Well, if anyone needs to lift him, I've got muscle to spare.
speak;Sages;Look, there was something I wanted to ask.
speak;Aerial;Sure, what's up?
speak;Sages;Your revealed physique is taking all the attention from me!
speak;Aerial;That ain't much of a question...|But, I can teach you my regimen, if you'd like.
speak;Sages;Too much work, I think putting on a bigger shirt is easier.
speak;Aerial;I'm sure you're plenty eye-catching enough, boss.
speak;Sages;Really? Woo!
speak;Aerial;Now, I better keep at my training, peace.
multi_remove_portrait;Aerial;Sages
remove_talk;Sages;Aerial
